data: {"generalSituation":"Under the influence of a humid southerly airstream, it will be foggy in the morning and warm during the day over the coast of Guangdong tomorrow. A cold front is expected to move across the coast of southern China later tomorrow to Tuesday at first. Temperatures will fall slightly over the region. An upper-air disturbance will bring showers to Guangdong on Tuesday. The northeast monsoon will persist over the coast of Guangdong in the middle to latter parts of this week. The weather will improve gradually with slightly cooler mornings over the region.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260302","week":"Monday","forecastWind":"South to southeast force 3, becoming northeast force 4 later.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two light rain patches and fog patches in the morning. Sunny intervals during the day.
